attributes.action: To allow Geert Wilders entry to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the interest of freedom of speech and an open relationship with our European friends. This is a petition to 10 Downing Street to allow Geert Wilders entry to the UK.

Geert does not make threats to any people. To deny him entry denies the public the opportunity to see him present his views and stifles discussion from both sides.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
